issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When I am running tests locally ITestNativeAzureFileSystemConcurrencyLive sometimes times out.

I would like to increase the timeout to avoid unnecessary noise.

As usual for a cloud store test, which endpoint did you run *all* the tests against? thanks

LGTM, but can you increase it to something bigger like 30000, just to avoid this problem resurfacing more often.

thanks
Thanks, attached a patch with 30 sec timeout.
